item.title: Creating LinkedIn Carousel/Slides
item.description: If you’ve been using LinkedIn recently, you’ve likely seen those posts where people post slides in a kind of carousel that you can horizontally scroll. They look like this: I wanted to create one to explain Apache Pinot’s Upserts feature, but I wasn’t sure how to create one. Since it’s 2023, I started by asking ChatGPT: Figure 1. ChatGPT doesn’t know about LinkedIn Carousel Unfortunately ChatGPT doesn’t know how to do it, but Harrison Avisto does!
